base_description: Gray cylinder with a rectangular protrusion.
part_description: Consists of a cylindrical base and a rectangular block on top; the base is wide and flat, while the block is small and centered.
internal_interaction_description: The rectangular block is securely attached to the top center of the cylindrical base, providing stability and a distinct geometric contrast. The flat surface of the cylinder supports the block, creating a unified structure.
external_interaction_description: This object can be placed on flat surfaces and may serve as a stand or support for lightweight items. The top block could be used for mounting or displaying small objects, interacting minimally with its surroundings.
